title: For Future Reference
author: VD
content_html:
That’s the real Donald Trump standing in between Joey Bosa of the San Francisco 49ers and Joe Burrow of the Cincinnati Bengals. Keep that in mind the next time you’re thinking that a man who looks like Donald Trump but isn’t towering over a 5’5″ dwarf like Joe Rogan might actually be him. Trump is closer to the size of an NFL linebacker than he is to the size of the average man. Some of you may have forgotten that I know this because I actually met him back in 1988. He’s a big man.

DISCUSS ON SG

Keep that in mind the next time you’re thinking that a man who looks like Donald Trump but isn’t towering over a 5’5″ dwarf like Joe Rogan might actually be him. Trump is closer to the size of an NFL linebacker than he is to the size of the average man. Some of you may have forgotten that I know this because I actually met him back in 1988. He’s a big man.
